Ph.D Student in Statistics

Bio

I am currently a graduate Ph.D student at Texas A&M University Statistics Department. I am broadly interested in the area of statistical learning and applied statistics.

Education

  • B.S. Mathematics (with highest distinictions), University of Oklahoma, 2020
  • B.A. Economics (with highest distinctions), University of Oklahoma, 2020

Publications
